meanings.definition: A large citrus fruit with a thick rind and sweet, juicy flesh.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating pumelos for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh pumelos on sale.
meanings.sent3: The pumelos were so big, they looked like oversized grapefruits!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a ripe pumelo on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The scent of pumelos filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.sent1: The pumelo tree in our garden provides shade in the summer.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take care of pumelo trees to grow delicious fruits.
meanings.sent3: The pumelo tree waved its branches in the wind, as if greeting the sun.
meanings.sent4: The pumelo tree stood tall and proud, bearing fruits like golden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the pumelo tree rustled softly in the evening breeze.
